django.contrib.gis.db.models.sql.conversion
===========================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.models.sql.conversion

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module holds simple classes to convert geospatial values from the
   database.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.models.sql.conversion.AreaField
   django.contrib.gis.db.models.sql.conversion.DistanceField
